modulegroup.name: Captcha Generator
modulegroup.description: The Captcha Generator is used to create an image containing a random line of text. These images are called captchas. Captchas are used in combination with input forms. The user has to type in the random captcha text in order to be able to submit the form.

modules.module: A captcha image with speak function.
A captcha image with a sinus distortion alghorithm.
